chunk:
Skinbetter science Cleansing Gel

Brand: Skinbetter Science

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua/Water, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate,

Chloride, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phytic Acid.

Directions: Use as part of your morning and evening skincare regimen. Apply a generous amount to damp skin. Massage gently with fingertips and rinse with warm water.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
